lead_paragraph: The University of Central Florida received a letter of inquiry from the N.C.A.A. on Wednesday, alerting it to an investigation into the football and men’s basketball programs.
snippet: The University of Central Florida received a letter of inquiry from the N.C.A.A. on Wednesday, alerting it to an investigation into the football and men’s basketball programs.
